sources.snippet: Stellar Bancorp, Inc. is a bank holding company headquartered in Houston, Texas. sources.title: Summary - Weiss Ratings
sources.snippet: The Weiss safety rating of Stellar Bank (Houston, TX) is C. Major Rating Factors: A current level of 4.8 percent of nonperforming loans to core capital combined with 3.1 percent from a year earlier contributes to the Fair asset quality (4.3). Operating profits as a percentage of assets at 1.4%, coupled with a return on assets of 1.1 has resulted in Fair (3.7) profitability.
